title: Removed setting of number of items text. Doing it dynamically now.
message:
Removed setting of number of items text. Doing it dynamically now.
(This is so that on screen rotation and the Activity is recreated, if not on the default Fragment, the text will still momentarily display the default... until now that is.)

title: Handle NullPointerException when setting the Views in setFinished().
message:
Handle NullPointerException when setting the Views in setFinished().
The Views are unfindable after a screen rotation.
A more correct solution (addressing the underlying cause) is forthcoming.

title: Changed Log levels for various Log calls. Raised priority for lifecycle methods;…
message: Changed Log levels for various Log calls. Raised priority for lifecycle methods; lowered priority for informational calls. Done so can filter out the higher volume calls and see the lifecycle calls more easily.

title: Performance improvement: get the PackageInfo when iterating through the…
message: Performance improvement: get the PackageInfo when iterating through the ResolveInfo list instead of getting the package names and then looping through the package names to get the PackageInfo. No need to do a whole 'nother loop.
